title: Middleware Admin - EU Candidates ONLY with fluent German
description: Middleware Admin Location: ONLY candidates based in the EU Type: Remote | Full-time Duration: 24 months Language Requirements: Very good command of both English and German languages. Responsibilities: Provide technical support for operating web-based information management and collaboration platforms – particularly Doxis (SER). Responsible for technical analysis, specification, documentation, installation, maintenance, and troubleshooting of web application middleware (Microsoft IIS, .NET, Microsoft SharePoint Server, Apache HTTP Server, Apache Tomcat) and web applications. Coordinate and configure IT infrastructure services required to provide comprehensive platform services for web applications within the company. Interact with colleagues from other IT departments to solve cross-functional and cross-project issues. Coordinate and implement changes to web application middleware and web applications according to defined processes. Incident and problem management and fulfilling requests within Second/Third-Level support. Proactively identify areas where system or process improvements can enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction. Requirements: Completed relevant vocational training and professional experience or Bachelor degree in Computer Science (or equivalent). Specialized technical knowledge in web application technology and web server environments, especially Java platforms (JEE), such as Apache Tomcat, etc., as well as Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft.NET platform, and Microsoft Internet Information Services. Knowledge in operating web-based information management and collaboration platforms. Technical understanding and knowledge in operating Windows (and Linux), Azure Cloud, and Docker / Kubernetes. Knowledge and experience with scripting languages (e.g., Windows PowerShell...). Technical understanding and basic knowledge of relational databases. Very good command of both English and German languages.
